coverage_details.organ_transplant: Organ Transplant benefit limited to heart, liver, and kidney; up to annual limit; excluding the cost of the organ itself.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 7,000.00 (Deductible: Nil; Dental limit as one limit, no segregation)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Pre-authorisation Required for outpatient & inpatient services up to 500,000.00. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: More flexibility for the first MRI and CT scan; Companion Expenses covered; Local Road Ambulance covered; Life-threatening congenital diseases; Allergy medicine & test covered if medically needed; Artificial Limbs & Prosthesis & Medical Equipment are covered; Psoriasis treatment covered for all classes; Covers Seasonal Hajj & Flu Vaccinations; Herbal origin prescription for a covered case covered if approved by SFDA; Rehabilitation Treatment, Congenital, Neonatal Care from Day 1, Physiotherapy, Hearing & Visual Aids, Vaccination & Pre-existing & Chronic Conditions covered; Singluair, Warts, Osteoporosis, and Local Injection (in joints) covered; Anti-body Screening and Vitamin D tests covered if related to a covered condition; Vitamins (including D & B12) covered if prescribed by treating doctor; All artificial organs (including IOL, joints replacement including Knee) covered up to annual limit; Medical devices for diabetes, pressure disease, Steam covered; Free style libra sensor, Medtronic I-port, Advance Injection Device included.

coverage_details.dental_general: SR 4,000.00 (Deductible: Nil; Dental limit as one limit, no segregation)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient services - except outpatient services has limits. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
